name: Same Time, Next Year
summary_text: A married man and a married woman end up sleeping with each other, and decide to meet at the same place every year on the anniversary of their one night stand. As the years go by, they observe changes in each other and their relationship.

name: Some Guy Who Kills People
summary_text: Ken Boyd, a lonely man fresh out of the loony bin, who sets out to kill those he deems responsible for his miserable life.

name: Betrayed
summary_text: An FBI agent posing as a combine driver becomes romantically involved with a Midwest farmer who lives a double life as a white supremacist.

name: Lone Wolf and Cub: Baby Cart at the River Styx
summary_text: Trailed by a clan of female ninja, Ogami is paid to assassinate a clan traitor accompanied by three killers known as the Gods of Death.

name: Terribly Happy
summary_text: A thriller about a Copenhagen cop who moves to a small town after having a nervous breakdown.

name: 13: Game of Death
summary_text: After losing his job, his car and his money, Phuchit, Krissada Sukosol, races against time to complete 13 tasks ordered by an anonymous caller who promised 100,000,000 Thai Baht upon completion.

name: Bittersweet
summary_text: A 30 years old Egyptian goes back to Egypt after living in America for 20 years, where he has a hard time coping with the difference, Specially after he loses his identity and all his money and becomes stuck in Egypt.

name: House of the Dead 2
summary_text: A virus breaks out at a university and people start to become zombies. After 29 days, a team of AMS scientists and soldiers are sent in to deal with the problem. But while they search, things go wrong.

name: The Vampire Lovers
summary_text: Seductive vampire Carmilla Karnstein and her family target the beautiful and the rich in a remote area of late eighteenth-century Gemany.

name: Children of the Corn
summary_text: While traveling, an unhappy married couple encounter a cult of murderous children who worship an entity called He Who Walks Behind the Rows.

name: Evil Aliens
summary_text: A TV crew, desperate to boost ratings, arrive on a remote Welsh farming island to investigate an intriguing incident. A local girl and her boyfriend had been abducted by aliens, who also impregnated her.

name: Communion
summary_text: Oct.4 and Dec.26 the Strieber family drives from NYC to their cabin in the woods. Both nights there are some powerful lights outside and maybe aliens. The dad is mentally affected by the "bad dream", goes to the shrink and is hypnotized.

name: American Flyers
summary_text: Marcus takes his kid brother, David, with him for a physical test and a brain scan, suspecting cerebral aneurysm like their dad died of. They head off on bikes for the big Rockies bike race with Marcus' Sarah driving the van.

name: Invasion of Astro-Monster
summary_text: Aliens known as the Xiliens arrive on Earth seeking to borrow Godzilla and Rodan to save their planet from Monster Zero. Sent on the expedition are astronauts Glenn and Fuji who discover it's none other than King Ghidorah.

name: Nobel Son
summary_text: A professor of chemistry wins the Nobel Prize. His wife joins him to Stockholm but his PhD. working son gets kidnapped. The kidnapper demands $2,000,000 = prize sum.

name: Singam
summary_text: Honest police officer Durai Singam locks horns with big-time extortionist Mayil Vaaganam.

name: Main Khiladi Tu Anari
summary_text: A Bombay police officer seeks revenge when his brother is killed by a powerful underworld figure. Things get complicated when a matinee movie idol begins to tag along the policeman so he can research a movie role.

name: Gertrud
summary_text: In the elegant world of artists and musicians, Gertrud ends her marriage to Gustav and takes a lover, the composer Erland Jansson.

name: Those People
summary_text: On Manhattan's gilded Upper East Side, a young gay painter is torn between an obsession with his infamous socialite best friend and a promising new romance with an older foreign concert pianist.

name: 7 Zwerge
summary_text: The Seven Dwarves live deep within a female-free-zone of the Enchanted Forest, but they cannot resist the innocent charms of Snow White when she enters their world. So when the evil queen (Nina Hagen) abducts her, it is up to the dwarves to save her life.

name: Driven
summary_text: Intense thriller where politics, big business and narcotics collide.

name: Kis Kisko Pyaar Karoon
summary_text: A comedy or errors, wherein a married man attempts to juggle his three wives along with his current girlfriend.

name: Arya 2
summary_text: A psychotic willing to sacrifice anything for friendship transforms himself for the sake of his best friend who's not really fond of him.

name: From the Land of the Moon
summary_text: In 1950s France, Gabrielle is a passionate, free-spirited woman who is in a loveless marriage and falls for another man when she is sent away to the Alps to treat her kidney stones. Gabrielle yearns to free herself and run away with André.

name: Kizzu ritân
summary_text: Dropping out of high school, two friends at first find success, one as a up-and-coming boxer and one as a low level gangster. Yet, their life decisions still find a way of catching up with them.

name: Uzun Hikâye
summary_text: A long story that started and ended at the station.

name: Tactical Force
summary_text: A training exercise for the LAPD SWAT Team goes terribly wrong when they find themselves pitted against two rival gangs while trapped in an abandoned Hangar, armed with nothing but blanks.

name: Any Body Can Dance 2
summary_text: Based on the true story of the Fictitious Dance group; their rise to fame, sudden downfall, and their heroic attempt to seek vindication by regaining their lost pride and glory.

name: Lesson of the Evil
summary_text: A popular high school teacher concocts an extreme plan to deal with the rise of bullying and bad behavior among the student body.

name: O chyom govoryat muzhchiny
summary_text: Four long-time friends take a two day road trip from Moscow to Odessa to attend a friend's party. While traveling, they discuss with one another the negatives about being married men.

name: Bombay Velvet
summary_text: An ordinary man goes against all odds and forges his destiny to become a 'Big Shot'.

name: The Ghost of Frankenstein
summary_text: Dr. Frankenstein's plans to replace the brain of his monster are hijacked by his scheming and malevolent assistant Ygor.

name: Bruiser
summary_text: After years of being tread upon and cheated on, a man awakens to find his face has a been replaced by a blank, white mask.

name: Camp
summary_text: After a series of Broadway flops, songwriter Bert Hanley (Dixon) goes to work at a musical camp for young performers. Inspired by the kids, he finds an opportunity to regain success by staging an altogether new production.

name: Blue Hawaii
summary_text: After arriving back in Hawaii from the Army, Chad Gates (Elvis Presley) defies his parents' wishes for him to work at the family business and instead goes to work as a tour guide at his girlfriend's agency.

name: The Wendell Baker Story
summary_text: Luke Wilson plays a good-hearted ex-con who gets a job in a retirement hotel. Three elderly residents help him win back his girlfriend as he lends them a hand in fighting hotel corruption.

name: The Four Feathers
summary_text: A timid British Army officer has quit and burns his last day summons to a war in Egypt. Calling him a coward, his girl friend and 3 officer friends give him a white feather. In redemption, he shadows his friends in war to save their lives.

name: Pokémon Heroes
summary_text: Two thieves take control of an ancient weapon designed to defend the canal city of Altomare.

name: How to Get Ahead in Advertising
summary_text: A cynical advertising exec has a block at work leading to a meltdown. He's hilariously out of control. Getting a big, talking boil on his shoulder doesn't help.

name: Twin Town
summary_text: Julian and Jeremy, two brothers prefer to spend their time on drugs and joyriding. When their father, Fatty Lewis, they show up demanding compensation.

name: A martfüi rém
summary_text: True story of a serial killer in 1950-60s Hungary.

name: The Lego Star Wars Holiday Special
summary_text: Rey leaves her friends to prepare for Life Day as she sets off on an adventure to gain a deeper knowledge of the Force. At a mysterious temple, she is hurled into a cross-timeline adventure. Will she make it back in time for Life Day?

name: Khumba
summary_text: Rejected by his superstitious herd, a half-striped zebra embarks on a daring quest to earn his stripes but finds the courage and self-acceptance to save all the animals of the Great Karoo.

name: Requiem
summary_text: An epileptic girl suffers a breakdown during her first year at university, then decides to seek help from a priest in battling the troubles associated with her strict upbringing.

name: Esperando la carroza
summary_text: Each member of this family tries to endorse someone else to care for the old Mother.

name: Goodbye Solo
summary_text: Two men form an unlikely friendship that will change both of their lives forever.

name: Swept Away
summary_text: A trip into the Mediterranean sea becomes a trip into the discovery of how society's frameworks of the rich and poor are delicate and temporary.

name: The Land That Time Forgot
summary_text: During World War I, a German U-boat sinks a British ship and takes the survivors on board. After it takes a wrong turn, the submarine takes them to the unknown land of Caprona, where they find dinosaurs and neanderthals.

name: Apartment 1303 3D
summary_text: A modern ghost story which turns a love/hate relationship between mother and daughter into a tale of horror. Some rentals are too good to be true.

name: Failan
summary_text: A marriage of convenience between a petty gangster and an illegal immigrant he has never met has unforeseen consequences for them both.

name: Prick Up Your Ears
summary_text: Biographer John Lahr is writing a book about playwright Joe Orton. Joe and Kenneth meet at drama school and live together for ten years as lovers and collaborators. Both want to be writers, but only one of them is successful.

name: Dungeons & Dragons: Wrath of the Dragon God
summary_text: Together, four heroes build their own army to retrieve the orb, using elemental forces to defeat Damodar before he summons the sleeping black dragon.

name: Mayis Sikintisi
summary_text: This is a movie within movie, which is almost recursive, i.e., the movie inside looks like director Ceylan's previous movie, Kasaba. It is about the movie director, Muzaffer, going back to ...                See full summary »

name: House
summary_text: In rural Alabama, two couples find themselves in a fight for survival. Running from a maniac (The Tin Man) bent on killing them, they flee deep into the woods and seek refuge in a house.

name: Jonathan
summary_text: Jonathan leaves the office every day at noon. When he gets home, he goes to sleep. Every morning he wakes up and there is a breakfast prepared for him along with a video telling him about the second part of his day.

name: Enemies Closer
summary_text: Deep within a forest on the U.S.-Canadian border, two sworn enemies must work together to escape a ruthless drug cartel hell-bent on retrieving a drug shipment which went missing there.

name: Feed
summary_text: A cybercrime investigator tracks a man suspected of force-feeding women to death.

name: All Dogs Go to Heaven 2
summary_text: Charlie and Itchy return to Earth to find Gabriel's Horn, but along the way meet up with a young boy named David, who ran away from home.

name: Firehouse Dog
summary_text: Rexxx, Hollywood's top canine star, gets lost and is adopted into a shabby firehouse. He teams up with a young kid to get the station back on its feet.

name: El habitante incierto
summary_text: In the dark corridors of Félix's house, an intruder is hiding. Is he real, or is he a manifestation inside the obscure maze of his mind?

name: Psycho Beach Party
summary_text: Chicklet is a sixteen-year old tomboy who's desperate to be part of the in-crowd of Malibu beach surfers. She's the typical American girl - except for one little problem: her personality is split into more slices than a pepperoni pizza.

name: Anna Karenina
summary_text: Anna (Marceau) is a wife and mother who has an affair with the handsome Count Vronsky (Bean). Based on the novel by Tolstoy.

name: Séptimo
summary_text: A father gets into a desperate search to find his children who disappeared while going down stairs from their apartment in the seventh floor.

name: Sarileru Neekevvaru
summary_text: A tough army major is deployed to Kurnool on a mission to keep the country safe from external threats.

name: Music Within
summary_text: The true story of Richard Pimentel, a brilliant public speaker with a troubled past, who returns from Vietnam deafened, and finds a new purpose in his landmark efforts on the behalf of Americans with disabilities.

name: Warlock: The Armageddon
summary_text: An order of Druids train their children to battle an evil Warlock determined to unleash Satan upon the world by bringing a collection of five mystic rune stones together.

name: The House That Dripped Blood
summary_text: An anthology of four horror stories revolving around a mysterious rental house in the U.K.

name: Veteran
summary_text: A honest cop seeks justice for a common man against all odds. A rich boy seeks revenge on the cop.

name: 100 Meters
summary_text: Based on true events, a Spanish man with multiple sclerosis who tried to finish an Iron-Man competition despite he was told that he could not make 100 meters.

name: Nude Nuns with Big Guns
summary_text: Mentally abused, enslaved and coerced into prostitution, a left-for-dead merciless Sister will take on a mission straight from God, whacking sinners in a strictly personal, no-prisoners vigilante Holy War.

name: Heart of Glass
summary_text: The foreman of a small village glassworks dies without revealing the secret to the famous "Ruby Glass".

name: Jacknife
summary_text: Two Vietnam vets, search for the strength to face up to their horrific war experiences and the tragic battle they survived. Their friendship begins to splinter, when one becomes romantically involved with the other's sister.

name: Wolf Totem
summary_text: During China's Cultural Revolution, a young urban student is sent to live with Mongolian herders, where he adopts a wolf cub.

name: Beau Geste
summary_text: Three adopted English brothers join the French Foreign Legion in North Africa, after one of them steals their adoptive family's famous heirloom sapphire.

name: Singam 3
summary_text: Uncompromising police chief Durai Singam battles against a criminal operation dealing in deadly toxic waste.

name: Welcome Back
summary_text: A pair of reformed gangsters try to find a husband for their newly discovered sister, but complications arise due to mistaken identities.

name: Not Cool
summary_text: A group of modern day Pittsburgh teenagers spend their Thanksgiving break experiencing a mixture of love, friendship, partying, and sex.

name: Sleepwalking
summary_text: The drama follows a twelve-year-old girl's struggle to come to terms with her mother's abandonment.

name: Road Games
summary_text: A laid-back American truck driver in south Australia starts to suspect a man driving a green van of killing young women along his route, and proceeds to play a cat-and-mouse game in order to catch him red-handed.

name: 7 Khoon Maaf
summary_text: Susanna is hungry for love and will go to any extent to find it in its purest form. In her quest for the perfect man, she gets married a number of times as each of her husband's die mysteriously.

name: A Touch of Zen
summary_text: A lady fugitive on the run from corrupt government officials is joined in her endeavors by an unambitious painter and skilled Buddhist monks.

name: While the City Sleeps
summary_text: A serial killer has been killing beautiful women in New York and the new owner of a media company offers a high ranking job to the first of his senior executives who can get the earliest scoops on the case.

name: Of Mice and Men
summary_text: A mentally disabled giant and his level headed guardian find work at a sadistic cowboy's ranch in depression era America.

name: Curse of the Pink Panther
summary_text: Ensuing after the events of Clouseau's disappearance, his bosses at the Surete put a computer into service to elect a new shrewd detective, Sleigh, who turns up just as inept as Clouseau.

name: Sura
summary_text: An ordinary fisherman attempts to save his village from a corrupted politician.

name: Chaman Bahaar
summary_text: A small town panwalla falls for a schoolgirl who lives opposite his shop. He experiences love, jealousy and betrayal without meeting her even once.

name: From Beijing with Love
summary_text: An incompetent 007-wannabe is sent to locate a stolen dinosaur skull.

name: The Hand
summary_text: A comic book artist loses his hand, which in turn takes on a murderous life of its own.

name: Frank & Lola
summary_text: A psychosexual noir love story, set in Las Vegas and Paris, about love, obsession, sex, betrayal, revenge and, ultimately, the search for redemption.

name: Wo ist Fred?
summary_text: In order to catch a basketball from the favorite team of his girlfriend's spoiled son, Fred poses as a numb, wheelchair-bound fan. But when he catches the ball, he also catches the ...                See full summary »

name: Warlock
summary_text: A famous gunman becomes the marshal of Warlock to end a gang's rampages, but is met with some opposition by a former gang member turned deputy sheriff who wants to follow only legal methods.

name: Catfight
summary_text: The rivalry between two former college friends comes to a head when they both attend the same glamorous event.

name: Samurai III: Duel at Ganryu Island
summary_text: Musashi Miyamoto is challenged to a duel by a confident swordsman Sasaki Kojiro. He agrees to fight him in a year's time.

name: Revenge of the Creature
summary_text: Men capture the Creature from the Black Lagoon and make him an aquarium attraction, from which he escapes.

name: Cimarron
summary_text: A newspaper editor settles in an Oklahoma boom town with his reluctant wife at the end of the nineteenth century.

name: Audrey Rose
summary_text: A stranger attempts to convince a happily married couple that their daughter is actually his daughter reincarnated.

name: Thale
summary_text: Estranged friends Leo (a crime-scene cleaner) and hired-hand Elvis are cleaning up a particularly messy casualty deep in the Norwegian woods. When Elvis accidentally finds a secret passage ...                See full summary »

name: Gonjiam: Haunted Asylum
summary_text: The crew of a horror web series travels to an abandoned asylum for a live broadcast. It soon encounters much more than expected as it moves deeper inside the nightmarish old building.

name: The Eel
summary_text: A businessman kills his adulterous wife and is sent to prison. After the release, he opens a barbershop and meets new people, talking almost to no one except an eel he befriended while in prison.

name: Humpday
summary_text: Two guys take their bromance to another level when they participate in an art film project.

name: Bound to Vengeance
summary_text: A young girl, chained in the basement of a sexual predator, escapes and turns the tables on her captor.

name: Scaramouche
summary_text: In France during the late 18th Century, a man sets out to avenge the death of his friend at the hands of a master swordsman.

name: The Woman in Green
summary_text: Sherlock Holmes investigates when young women around London turn up murdered, each with a finger severed. Scotland Yard suspects a madman, but Holmes believes the killings to be part of a diabolical plot.

name: Last Orders
summary_text: A group of old friends reminisce about their lives over the years after the death of one of their crew.

name: Best Defense
summary_text: A military weapons engineer struggles to do his job responsibly, while a hapless tank commander has to live with the consequences in combat years later.

name: Le Deuxième Souffle
summary_text: A gangster escapes jail and quickly makes plans to continue his criminal ways elsewhere, but a determined inspector is closing in.

name: Loft
summary_text: Five best friends, all married, decide to share a loft apartment to carry on affairs.

name: Murphy's Romance
summary_text: Emma moves to a ranch with her son after a divorce and befriends the older Murphy, but things turn complicated when her ex shows up.

name: George Carlin... It's Bad for Ya!
summary_text: It's Bad For Ya, Carlin's Emmy-nominated 14th and final HBO special from March of 2008 features Carlin's noted irreverent and unapologetic observations on topics ranging from death, ...                See full summary »

name: The Big Gundown
summary_text: Unofficial lawman John Corbett hunts down Cuchillo Sanchez, a Mexican peasant accused of raping and killing a 12-year-old girl.

name: Dark Blue World
summary_text: The friendship of two men becomes tested when they both fall for the same woman.

name: Billy Jack
summary_text: Ex-Green Beret hapkido expert saves wild horses from being slaughtered for dog food and helps protect a desert "freedom school" for runaway.

name: Rigor Mortis
summary_text: A public housing tenement is plunged into a dark storm of supernatural chaos.

name: The Trials of Cate McCall
summary_text: In order to be reinstated to the bar and recover custody of her daughter, a hotshot lawyer, now in recovery and on probation, must take on the appeal of a woman wrongfully convicted of murder.

name: Jalsa
summary_text: Sanjay, a young man, joins an extremist group after having had a troublesome childhood. A policeman decides to guide him towards a far better path and in doing so, his daughter falls crazy with Sanjay.

name: Magicians
summary_text: A pair of rivaling stage magicians are forced to confront their falling out over a guillotine mishap when they compete in a magic competition.

name: The Brother from Another Planet
summary_text: A mute alien with the appearance of a black human is chased by outer-space bounty hunters through the streets of Harlem.

name: Les Misérables in Concert: The 25th Anniversary
summary_text: A celebratory 25th anniversary concert performance of the hit musical at The O2 in London.

name: Drive
summary_text: A prototype enhanced human, on the run from Chinese-hired hit men, hooks up with a dread-locked bystander, and the two of them elude their pursuers narrowly each time.

name: The Silent Partner
summary_text: A timid bank teller anticipates a bank robbery and steals the money himself before the crook arrives. When the sadistic crook realizes he's been fooled, he tracks down the teller and engages him in a cat-and-mouse chase for the cash.

name: A New Leaf
summary_text: Henry Graham lives the life of a playboy. When his lawyer tells him one day that his lifestyle has consumed all his funds, he needs an idea to avoid climbing down the social ladder. So he intends to marry a rich woman and - murder her.

name: Beyond the Gates
summary_text: Two estranged brothers reunite at their missing father's video store and find a VCR board game dubbed 'Beyond The Gates' that holds a connection to their father's disappearance.

name: The TV Set
summary_text: The story of a TV pilot as it goes through the Network TV process of casting, production and finally airing.

name: Long Time Dead
summary_text: A young college student and his friends use an Ouija board to hold a seance, triggering a chain of mysterious deaths that may be caused by an otherworldly force.

name: Dark Night of the Scarecrow
summary_text: In a small Southern town, a wrongfully-killed man exacts revenge from beyond the grave on those who murdered him.

name: Mis
summary_text: The main character is the manager of a sport club, nicknamed "Teddy Bear" by his friends and acquaintances. One day he is detained at the border just as his sport team is off to a ...                See full summary »

name: Lola
summary_text: A bored young man meets with his former girlfriend, now a cabaret dancer and single mother, and soon finds himself falling back in love with her.

name: The Quatermass Xperiment
summary_text: Professor Bernard Quatermass' manned rocket ship returns to Earth, but two of the astronauts are missing and the survivor seems ill and unable to communicate.

name: Gangster
summary_text: In Seoul, a gangster's alcoholic moll falls in love with another man.

name: Import Export
summary_text: A nurse from Ukraine searches for a better life in the West, while an unemployed security guard from Austria heads East for the same reason.

name: Juste une question d'amour
summary_text: After his gay cousin dies from hepatitis, young Laurent, who lives with his best friend Carole, falls in love with Cedric, a plant scientist. He's afraid to inform his conservative parents that he is gay.

name: Torbaaz
summary_text: A man rises from personal tragedy to lead a group of children from a refugee camp to victory, transforming their lives through the game of cricket.

name: Goodbye to Language
summary_text: A silent, surreal parallel between a couple and a dog.

name: Chekka Chivantha Vaanam
summary_text: A bloody power struggle erupts between three brothers who are vying to take over the family business following the death of their father.

name: Evim Sensin
summary_text: It is about true love, that comes only once a life. But unfortunately a terrible disease doesn't give them chance to be happy together.

name: King Kong Lives
summary_text: Kong falls from the twin towers and he appears to be alive. However, his heart is failing, so it's replaced with an artificial one. All is well until he senses that there's a female Kong somewhere out there and escapes wreaking havoc.

name: Another Country
summary_text: Based on the life of the young Guy Burgess, who would become better known as one of the Cambridge Spies.

name: Two Rode Together
summary_text: A corrupt marshal is pressured by his army friend into negotiating the release of white captives of the Comanches, but finds that their reintegration into society has its consequences.

name: Devil's Gate
summary_text: Seeking a missing woman in North Dakota, an FBI agent and a sheriff focus on her religious zealot husband but discover something far more sinister.

name: Avalon High
summary_text: A teenage girl moves to a new high school where she slowly discovers herself involved in the reincarnation of King Arthur.

name: The White Sheik
summary_text: During a day in their honeymoon, a couple is separated by the city's lust and the desires it produces.

name: Minutemen
summary_text: A comedy/sci-fi/adventure about three high school kids who invent a 10 minute time machine to spare others just like them from the humiliation they've endured.

name: Legends of Oz: Dorothy's Return
summary_text: Shortly after a tornado rips through her Kansas home, Dorothy returns to Oz to save her friends from a villainous jester.

name: Torrente 3: El protector
summary_text: The horrendous spanish detective becomes a bodyward in his new third adventure.

name: Bloodsucking Bastards
summary_text: A down on his luck cubicle worker and his slacker best friend discover their new boss is a vampire who is turning their coworkers into the un-dead.

name: The Nanny
summary_text: There's just something not quite right when Bette Davis stars as an English nanny. And is her 10-year-old charge an emotionally disturbed murderer or just an insolent brat?

name: Wonder Woman: Bloodlines
summary_text: Wonder Woman tries to help a troubled young girl, Vanessa, who has fallen in with a deadly organization known as Villainy Inc. headed by Dr. Cyber.

name: Coming Home
summary_text: Lu and Feng are a devoted couple forced to separate when Lu is arrested and sent to a labor camp as a political prisoner during the Cultural Revolution. He finally returns home only to find that his beloved wife no longer recognizes him.

name: The Tower
summary_text: A Christmas Eve party at a luxury residential building takes a horrific turn when a fire breaks out.

name: Karafuru
summary_text: A sinful spirit is granted the opportunity to prove worthy for rebirth, inhabiting the body of a student who killed himself.

name: FairyTale: A True Story
summary_text: In 1917, two children take a photograph, which is soon believed by some to be the first scientific evidence of the existence of fairies.

name: One Point O
summary_text: After receiving mysterious empty packages inside his apartment, a young computer-programmer begins a personal investigation into their origins.

name: Dressed to Kill
summary_text: Sherlock Holmes sets out to discover why a trio of murderous villains, including a dangerously attractive female, are desperate to obtain three unassuming and inexpensive little music boxes.

name: The Adventures of Prince Achmed
summary_text: A handsome prince rides a flying horse to faraway lands and embarks on magical adventures, which include befriending a witch, meeting Aladdin, battling demons and falling in love with a princess.

name: Hell Comes to Frogtown
summary_text: After a worldwide nuclear war, where 68% of the male population was wiped out and virile men becoming a rarity, Sam Hell, a scavenger and a highly virile man, is assigned to help rescue a group of fertile women kidnapped by humanoid frogs.

name: The Trip to Spain
summary_text: Actors Steve Coogan and Rob Brydon embark on a six-part episodic road trip through Europe. This time they're in Spain, sampling the restaurants, eateries, and sights along the way.

name: Never Die Alone
summary_text: A drug kingpin's return home touches off a turf war.

name: Q & A
summary_text: Dirty cop, Mike Brennan thinks he got away with murder. But during a routine Q&A, the righteous assistant DA finds a clue that sets them both on a collision course.

name: The Square
summary_text: A man's life begins to unravel when his mistress brings him a bag of cash.

name: Black & White
summary_text: A group of white high school teens become involved with Harlem's black hip-hop crowd.

name: Auch Zwerge haben klein angefangen
summary_text: A group of dwarfs at a correctional facility erupt in anarchy.

name: Dr. Terror's House of Horrors
summary_text: Aboard a British train, mysterious fortune teller Dr. Schreck uses tarot cards to read the futures of five fellow passengers.

name: Brooklyn Rules
summary_text: Brooklyn, 1985. With the mob world as a backdrop, three life-long friends struggle with questions of love, loss and loyalty.

name: Planet of the Vampires
summary_text: After landing on a mysterious planet, a team of astronauts begin to turn on each other, swayed by the uncertain influence of the planet and its strange inhabitants.

name: Terror by Night
summary_text: When the fabled Star of Rhodesia diamond is stolen on a London to Edinburgh train and the son of its owner is murdered, Sherlock Holmes must discover which of his suspicious fellow passengers is responsible.

name: The Suspect
summary_text: Betrayed and on the run, a North Korean agent tries to uncover the volatile secrets hidden inside the eyeglasses of a dead man.

name: Room at the Top
summary_text: An ambitious young accountant plots to wed a wealthy factory owner's daughter, despite falling in love with a married older woman.

name: Karakomik Filmler: Emanet
summary_text: In the second part of Karakomik Filmler's sequel, Emanet is about an amateur dancer who dreams of fame. He tries to realise it by demonstrating his skills on TV, in a talent show.

name: Batman Beyond: The Movie
summary_text: Decades after the retirement of Bruce Wayne as Batman, a boy dons the identity to avenge his own father's murder.

name: The Story of Qiu Ju
summary_text: A pregnant peasant woman seeks redress from the Chinese bureaucracy after the village chief kicks her husband in the groin in this comedy of justice. As she is frustrated by each level of ...                See full summary »

name: Born in East L.A.
summary_text: When an L.A. born American citizen is mistaken for a Mexican illegal alien and deported to Mexico, he has to do everything he can to get across the border.

name: Voyage to the Bottom of the Sea
summary_text: When the Earth is threatened by a burning Van Allen Radiation Belt, U.S. Navy Admiral Harriman Nelson plans to shoot a nuclear missile at the Belt, using his experimental atomic submarine, the Seaview.

name: Red White & Blue
summary_text: A woman attracts the attention of a psychopathic former Army interrogator and an emotionally fragile young man caring for his ailing mother.

name: One from the Heart
summary_text: A couple has a fight after living together 5 years in Las Vegas. They go out and celebrate 4th of July, each with a new partner. Breakup?

name: The Last of Sheila
summary_text: A year after Sheila is killed in a hit-and-run, her wealthy husband invites a group of friends to spend a week on his yacht playing a scavenger hunt mystery game. The game turns out to be all too real and all too deadly.

name: Sharky's Machine
summary_text: Tom Sharky is demoted to vice after a bust goes terribly wrong. He and his team stumble across a mob murder tied to prostitution and government.

name: Dolemite
summary_text: After he is released from jail, a pimp takes on the criminals and corrupt police officers who framed him in the first place.

name: Martyrs
summary_text: A woman and her childhood friend seek out revenge on those who victimized and abused them.

name: Mama's Boy
summary_text: A twenty-nine year-old slacker who lives with his mom realizes his sweet set-up is threatened when she hears wedding bells with her self-help guru beau.

name: Al di là delle nuvole
summary_text: Made of four short tales, linked by a story filmed by Wim Wenders. Taking place in Ferrara, Portofino, Aix en Provence and Paris, each story, which always a woman as the crux of the story, ...                See full summary »

name: The Night Stalker
summary_text: An abrasive Las Vegas newspaper reporter investigates a series of murders committed by a vampire.

name: The Curse of the Werewolf
summary_text: In eighteenth-century Spain, an adopted boy becomes a werewolf and terrorizes the inhabitants of his town.

name: Total Dhamaal
summary_text: A group of people learn about a hidden treasure and then they race to find it and claim it.

name: The Grand
summary_text: An improvisational comedy using a handful of actors playing characters competing in an actual poker tournament.

name: Losing Isaiah
summary_text: The biological and adoptive mothers of a young boy are involved in a bitter, controversial custody battle.

name: Life with Mikey
summary_text: A once-popular actor who now runs a talent agency specializing in child acts is trying to discover the next star. He gets more than he bargained for when he recruits a child pickpocket.

name: Live Twice, Love Once
summary_text: A retired academic teacher tries to find the love of his youth after being diagnosed with Alzheimer's.

name: Alai Payuthey
summary_text: After a difficult romance in a class-divided society, the love birds find out marriage is not what they thought it would be.

name: Greenfingers
summary_text: A prison inmate with a green thumb goes on to compete in a national gardening competition. Based on a true story.

name: The Tomb of Ligeia
summary_text: A man's obsession with his dead wife drives a wedge between him and his new bride.

name: The Sixth Man
summary_text: A college athlete returns from the dead to help his brother's basketball team win the NCAA title.

name: The Boy Who Could Fly
summary_text: An autistic boy who dreams of flying touches everyone he meets, including a new family who has moved in after their father dies.

name: Grupo 7
summary_text: A squad of four undercover cops are charged with cleaning up the streets of Seville from drugs and prostitution.

name: Fatherland
summary_text: In April 1964, more than twenty years after the Nazis won World War II, S.S. officer Xavier March (Rutger Hauer) uncovers a plot to eliminate the attendees of the Wannsee Conference so that Germany can establish better relations with the U.S.

name: There's No Business Like Show Business
summary_text: Molly and Terry Donahue, plus their three children, are The Five Donahues. Son Tim meets hat-check girl Vicky and the family act begins to fall apart.

name: Shadow of the Thin Man
summary_text: Nick and Nora are at their wisecracking best as they investigate murder and racketeering at a local race track.

name: Sharknado 5: Global Swarming
summary_text: With much of America lying in ruins, the rest of the world braces for a global sharknado, and Fin and his family must travel around the world to stop them.

name: Midnight Runners
summary_text: Two friends who are students at Korean National Police University, find themselves in an endless race against time after they witness a kidnapping and decide to use their knowledge.

name: Natsamrat
summary_text: After he retires, an aging theatre actor and his wife begin to feel unwanted by their children.

name: Geography Club
summary_text: At Goodkind High School, a group of students with varying sexual orientations form an after-school club as a discreet way to share their feelings and experiences.

name: Fail Safe
summary_text: Cold War tensions climb to a fever pitch when a U.S. bomber is accidentally ordered to drop a nuclear warhead on Moscow.

name: Pithamagan
summary_text: Chittan, a social outcast, has grown up in a cemetery. A drug dealer finds him a job in a cannabis farm. In prison, he meets a conman, Shakti. This friendship transforms him from his stony existence.

name: The Wild Goose Lake
summary_text: A gangster on the run sacrifices everything for his family and a woman he meets while on the lam.

name: Unknown Origins
summary_text: Madrid, 2019. A serial killer is spreading chaos. Anonymous people with no apparent connection are being murdered while imitating the first appearances of the most famous superheroes.

name: Prom Night II
summary_text: Thirty years after her accidental death at her 1957 senior prom, the tortured spirit of prom queen Mary Lou Maloney returns to seek revenge.

name: Murder at the Gallop
summary_text: When a wealthy old man appears to have been "frightened to death" by a cat, Miss Jane Marple suspects one of his four relatives, all heirs to his estate, of his murder.

name: Ashes in the Snow
summary_text: In 1941, a 16-year-old aspiring artist and her family are deported to Siberia amidst Stalin's brutal dismantling of the Baltic region. One girl's passion for art and her never-ending hope will break the silence of history.

name: The Echo
summary_text: An ex-con moves into an old apartment building, where he encounters a domestic problem involving a police officer, his wife, and their daughter. When he tries to intervene, however, a mysterious curse entraps him.

name: The Manhattan Project
summary_text: A high school prodigy builds an atomic bomb with stolen plutonium to win the 45th National Science Fair and expose a nuclear weapons lab posing as nuclear medicine in Ithaca NY.

name: Sherlock Holmes and the Secret Weapon
summary_text: Sherlock Holmes and Doctor Watson must protect a Swiss inventor of an advanced bomb sight from falling into German hands.

name: Paperhouse
summary_text: A young girl lost in the loneliness and boredom of reality finds solace in an ill boy, whom she can visit in a surreal dream world that she drew in her school composition book.

name: Rad
summary_text: The story of one young man, Cru Jones, who has the intensity and desire to win a BMX race called Helltrack.

name: Blue Caprice
summary_text: An abandoned boy is lured to America and drawn into the shadow of a dangerous father figure. Inspired by the real-life events that led to the 2002 Beltway sniper attacks.

name: Godzilla, Mothra and King Ghidorah: Attack of the Giant Monsters
summary_text: A reporter, notorious for working on pseudo-documentaries, must uncover the legend of the three guardian monsters who must rise to defend Japan from the vengeful spirits within Godzilla.

name: Sweet Movie
summary_text: After winning the "most virgin" contest, Miss Canada is married to a rich milk tycoon. But she quickly flees the marriage to experience the world around her, full of sweetness and anarchy.

name: Cub
summary_text: Over-imaginative 12 year-old Sam heads off to the woods to summer scout camp with his pack convinced he will encounter a monster...and he does.

name: The Country Girl
summary_text: A director hires an alcoholic has-been and strikes up a stormy relationship with the actor's wife, who he believes is the cause of all the man's problems.

name: American Woman
summary_text: A woman raises her young grandson after her daughter goes missing.

name: 13 Ghosts
summary_text: A family inherits what proves to be a haunted house, but a special pair of goggles allows them to see their ghostly tormentors.

name: The Belly of an Architect
summary_text: An architect supervising an exhibition starts to have mysterious stomach pains while his life slowly falls apart.

name: S.O.B.
summary_text: A movie producer who made a huge flop tries to salvage his career by revamping his film as an erotic production, where its family-friendly star takes her top off.

name: A Room for Romeo Brass
summary_text: Two twelve-year-old boys, Romeo and Gavin, undergo an extraordinary test of character and friendship when Morell, a naive but eccentric and dangerous stranger, comes between them. Morell ...                See full summary »

name: Poison Ivy II
summary_text: First time out of Michigan, Lily starts art school in LA and shares a house with other young artistic people. Both her teacher and a roomie/classmate show interest in her.

name: The Burmese Harp
summary_text: In the War's closing days, when a conscience-driven Japanese soldier fails to get his countrymen to surrender to overwhelming force, he adopts the lifestyle of a Buddhist monk.

name: Crazy on the Outside
summary_text: A recently paroled ex-con who has trouble adjusting to the wacky normalcy of life outside of prison. He has spent the last three years behind bars after getting caught committing a crime and taking the rap for his much more dangerous pal.

name: The Tree of Wooden Clogs
summary_text: Peasant life in a feudal farm in rural Italy at the end of the 19th century.

name: Shuttle
summary_text: A late night airport shuttle ride home descends into darkness.

name: The Breaker Upperers
summary_text: For the right price, BFFs Jen and Mel will ruthlessly end any romance. But when one grows a conscience, it threatens to derail their relationship.

name: À Nos Amours
summary_text: An erratic young woman's family desperately tries to prevent her increasingly erotic ways.

name: Boy Culture
summary_text: A successful male escort describes in a series of confessions his tangled romantic relationships with his two roommates and an older, enigmatic male client.

name: Arya
summary_text: Geethanjali, who is already the girlfriend of the college rowdy Ajay, is pursued by the free spirited and Arya. Arya relentlessly tries to woo Geethanjali causing problems between him and Ajay.

name: Sahte Kabadayi
summary_text: Mafia father's legacy with his son, Kemal divided his father's death. To get his father's revenge takes back the money of everyone else.

name: Zero 2
summary_text: What would you get if you mix a gangster film and a soap opera? "Zero 2" is a crazy twister of criminal romance and sexy violence that just might laugh you to death.

name: Hababam Sinifi Güle Güle
summary_text: A literature teacher who was born in a village comes to Hababam Sinifi. However, the students in the class mock him because of his accent.

name: Love at First Fight
summary_text: Between his friends and the family business, Arnaud's summer looks set to be a peaceful one. Peaceful until he runs into Madeleine, as beautiful as she is brusque, a concrete block of tensed muscles and doomsday prophecies.

name: Toto le héros
summary_text: Thomas and Alfred were born around the same time; a fire in the nursery had nurses scrambling to save the newborns. Because he felt that he deserved Alfred's good fortune at being born into...                See full summary »

name: Concrete Cowboy
summary_text: Sent to live with his estranged father for the summer, a rebellious teen finds kinship in a tight-knit Philadelphia community of Black cowboys.

name: Vinyan
summary_text: A couple are looking for their child who was lost in the tsunami - their search takes them to the dangerous Thai-Burmese waters, and then into the jungle, where they face unknown but horrifying dangers.

name: Senior Trip
summary_text: To embarrass his rival, a scheming senator uses nitwit Ohio teens who are invited to a Washington gathering on educational failure.

name: Let's Kill Ward's Wife
summary_text: Everyone hates Ward's wife and wants her dead, but when his friends' murderous fantasies come true, additional complications arise. A blackly comic caper about helping a friend out of a bad relationship by any means necessary.

name: R... Rajkumar
summary_text: An aimless youth starts working for drug baron and his mission is to kill is rival.

name: The Journey of Natty Gann
summary_text: In the 1930s, a tomboy runs away from her guardian to join her single father who is 2,000 miles away, where he has found work.

name: Gloria
summary_text: After serving three years in prison covering for her gangster boyfriend, Kevin, Gloria returns to New York City for the money she was promised. Inside Kevin's base of operations, she finds 7 year old Nicky, whose family has been killed.

name: The ComDads
summary_text: The woman, whose troubled son has left a home, informs two different men from her past that each of them is a real father. Too different men.

name: Sag Salim
summary_text: This fast paced farce begins with an apparently innocuous request from a village elder to take a recently deceased man to his home village for proper burial. Salim, the simple village man ...                See full summary »

name: The Satanic Rites of Dracula
summary_text: This is the eighth film in Hammer's Dracula series, and the seventh and final one to feature Christopher Lee as Dracula and the fourth one with Peter Cushing as Van Helsing. This film takes...                See full summary »

name: Tom of Finland
summary_text: Award-winning filmmaker Dome Karukoski brings to screen the life and work of artist Touko Valio Laaksonen (aka Tom of Finland), one of the most influential and celebrated figures of twentieth century gay culture.

name: Texas Rangers
summary_text: A ragtag group of youngsters band together after the American Civil War to form the Texas Rangers, a group charged with the dangerous, ruthless duty of cleaning up the West.

name: The Monitor
summary_text: After a baby monitor picks up another channel, Anna begins reliving the nightmare she'd recently escaped.

name: Mr. Skeffington
summary_text: Popular and beautiful Fanny Trellis is forced into a loveless marriage with an older man, Jewish banker Job Skeffington, in order to save her beloved brother Trippy from an embezzlement charge.
